detailed_translations.english: an attempt to persuade someone by using influence, arguments, or threats

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…施加压力， 迫使， 说服
detailed_translations.english: to try to make someone do something by making them feel it is their duty to do it

sentences.english: Relevant documents were presented in court.
sentences.chinese: 法庭上出示了相关的文件。

sentences.chinese: 我们收到了所有相关信息。

detailed_translations.english: directly relating to the subject or problem being discussed or considered

trans: n. 有效，有效性；效益，效用

sentences.chinese: 有时候你需要牺牲效率来达到效果。

sentences.english: However, its viability and effectiveness still have to be established.
sentences.chinese: 然而，它的有效性和可行性尚有待验证。

sentences.chinese: 那么，您如何管理并度量面向您的企业的 IT 治理解决方案的有效性呢？

sentences.chinese: 有人在页边写了条批注。

sentences.english: Use double spacing and wide margins to leave room for comments.
sentences.chinese: 采用双倍行距和宽阔的页边空白，以便留出地方写评注。

sentences.english: the western margin of southern Africa
sentences.chinese: 非洲南部的西隅

detailed_translations.english: the empty space at the side of a page

sentences.english: Compensation is available for people who have developed asthma as a direct result of their work.
sentences.chinese: 直接因工作原因患哮喘的人会获得赔偿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 结果发生；终归（result的三单形式）

sentences.english: The club’s priority is to win the League.
sentences.chinese: 该俱乐部首先考虑的是要赢得联赛。

sentences.english: After several burglaries in the area, security is now a high priority (= very important and needing attention soon ) .

sentences.english: With so little money available, repairs must remain a low priority (= not important and not needing attention soon ) .
sentences.chinese: 可用的钱这么少，只好暂时放下维修事宜了。

sentences.english: The customer is high on our list of priorities .
sentences.chinese: 顾客在我们的心目中排在第一位。

sentences.english: List your tasks in order of priority (= most important first ) .
sentences.chinese: 按照轻重缓急列出你的工作。

detailed_translations.english: the thing that you think is most important and that needs attention before anything else

sentences.english: ...a collaborative research project.
sentences.chinese: …一个合作研究项目。

detailed_translations.english: a job or piece of work that involves two or more people working together to achieve something

name: creative
trans: adj. 创造的；创造性的；有创造力(或想象力) 的

sentences.english: This job is so boring. I wish I could do something more creative.
sentences.chinese: 这工作太单调了，我希望能做些更有创造性的事情。

sentences.english: I teach creative writing at Trinity College.
sentences.chinese: 我在三一学院教创意写作。

sentences.english: the creative process of writing a poem
sentences.chinese: 写诗的创作过程

sentences.english: Diaghilev did his great creative work in France.
sentences.chinese: 狄亚格列夫在法国编创了富有创新性的伟大作品。

sentences.english: a creative solution to the problem

name: communication
trans: n. 交流，交往；沟通；传达；通信

name: pattern
trans: n. 形态，样式，格局；模式；花样，图案

sentences.english: Weather patterns have changed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 气候模式近年已经发生了变化。

sentences.english: A general pattern began to emerge .
sentences.chinese: 一个总体模式开始显现。

sentences.english: Their descriptions seemed to follow a set pattern (= always develop in the same way ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的描述似乎依据固定的模式。

sentences.english: His behavior fits a pattern of violent acts.
sentences.chinese: 他的举动符合暴力行为的模式。

sentences.english: a dress pattern
sentences.chinese: 连衣裙的纸样

detailed_translations.english: the regular way in which something happens, develops, or is done

sentences.english: a strict teacher
sentences.chinese: 严格的老师

detailed_translations.english: expecting people to obey rules or to do what you say

name: time management skills
trans: 时间管理方面的技巧 ( 吞 )

sentences.chinese: 有必要刺激一下他的冷漠。

sentences.english: With this new tool, you can determine exactly where to place the stimulation electrode in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 有了这个新工具，您可以准确地确定在大脑何处放置刺激电极。

sentences.english: So far, such stimulation appears to be its principle response - but that will not be easy for structural reasons.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，这样的刺激似乎是原则性的回应——但由于结构性原因，这并非易事。

sentences.english: Thank you for your participation.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你的参与。

sentences.chinese: 有许多观众参与的娱乐活动

detailed_translations.english: the act of taking part in an activity or event

sentences.chinese: 就再做一道这本练习册中的练习吧。

detailed_translations.english: a school book containing questions and exercises

trans: adj. 相似的，相像的，相仿的

sentences.chinese: 我们对音乐的品位相近。

sentences.english: Both approaches seem to achieve similar results.

sentences.english: A number of his friends had been affected in a similar way .

sentences.chinese: 我知道我对明天的考试准备不足。

trans: 形容词短语 很容易理解的

sentences.chinese: 他很轻易就被说服了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 说服，劝说；使某人相信；劝某人做（不做）某事

sentences.chinese: 在审判过程中听过证词的人都对此结果感到吃惊。

name: works
trans: n. 著作，作品(注意复数)

sentences.chinese: 每个人的隐私权

detailed_translations.english: the state of being free from public attention

sentences.english: The treatment may bring short-term benefits to AIDS sufferers.
sentences.chinese: 这种疗法对艾滋病患者可能会有短期效果。

sentences.english: Most of the staff are on short-term contracts.
sentences.chinese: 大部分职员签的都是短期合同。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for only a short time, or relating only to the period that is not very far into the future

sentences.chinese: 总统已经批准了这个计划。

sentences.english: The President would appoint the Council of Ministers, subject to the approval of the National Assembly.

detailed_translations.english: when a plan, decision, or person is officially accepted

sentences.chinese: 她看了信，给我们大概翻译了一下。

sentences.chinese: 他滑开玻璃柜的门。

a large structure with steps leading to the top of a long sloping surface which children can slide down

sentences.chinese: 米勒是个话不多且可靠的人。

sentences.chinese: 这个新的项目何时完工没有预定日期。

sentences.chinese: 我们每年收到数百封求职信。

sentences.chinese: 我填完申请表后把它寄了出去。

sentences.chinese: …一家保险公司利用多媒体技术改善其分支机构的客户服务的实例。

sentences.chinese: …微软的文字处理软件和排版软件中提供的种类繁多的字体。

sentences.chinese: 在数学中，我们会使用多种方法解题。

sentences.chinese: ...人类学实地考察。

sentences.chinese: 老师提供了几种不同的材料让孩子们试验。

sentences.english: The decline and fall of the American car industry is relatively easy to summarise, and the Hummer is its reductio.
sentences.chinese: 美国汽车业的衰亡相对比较容易概括总结，悍马正是美国汽车业的缩影。

sentences.chinese: 气候渐渐发生了变化。

sentences.chinese: 制造业的逐渐衰退

trans: adj. 合法的；法律的，法律上的

sentences.chinese: 公司所做的这一切完全合法。

sentences.english: plans to make the carrying of identity cards a legal requirement
sentences.chinese: 使携带身份证成为法定要求的计划

sentences.english: He had twice the legal limit of alcohol in his bloodstream.
sentences.chinese: 他血液中的酒精含量是法定限度的两倍。

sentences.english: a pressure group that is campaigning to make cannabis legal
sentences.chinese: 争取大麻合法化的压力团体

detailed_translations.english: if something is legal, you are allowed to do it or have to do it by law

sentences.english: She doesn’t feel safe in the house on her own.
sentences.chinese: 她独自一人在家感到不安全。

sentences.english: Make sure you keep these documents safe .
sentences.chinese: 你一定要妥善保管这些文件。

detailed_translations.english: not in danger of being harmed, lost, or stolen
a strong metal box or cupboard with special locks where you keep money and valuable things

name: transportation
trans: n. 运输，输送；＜美＞运输车辆，交通车辆

sentences.english: The city needs to improve its public transportation (= buses, trains etc ) .
sentences.chinese: 这座城市需要改善公共交通。

detailed_translations.english: a system or method for carrying passengers or goods from one place to another

sentences.english: Put your rubbish in the bin.
sentences.chinese: 把你的垃圾放进箱子。

sentences.english: But you know how it is with us human you take something good you dissect it scrutinise it time and again not believing your good fortune and finally cast it to the "no" bin.
sentences.chinese: 可是你知道的，对我们人类来说，你以为某件事物很好、你仔细分析它、细看它一次又一次，不相信你的好运，最后又把它丢到「不」的箱子里（不再理它），这真是很消极又愚蠢的。

detailed_translations.english: a large container for storing things, such as goods in a shop or substances in a factory

name: stick
trans: n.vt.vi. 枝条，柴枝；棍，棒，手杖粘贴；使停止，阻塞固定不动；被困住

sentences.english: a pair of drum sticks
sentences.chinese: 一对鼓槌

sentences.english: a measuring stick
sentences.chinese: 量尺

sentences.english: Aunt Lou walks with a stick (= uses a stick to help her walk ) .
sentences.chinese: 卢姑妈走路要拄拐棍。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin piece of wood, plastic etc that you use for a particular purpose
if a pointed object sticks into something, or if you stick it there, it is pushed into it

name: flavour
trans: n.vt. 味道给(食物或饮品) 调味

sentences.english: Which flavour do you want - chocolate or vanilla?
sentences.chinese: 你要哪种味道的，巧克力还是香草？

detailed_translations.english: the particular taste of a food or drink

sentences.english: Why do Americans spend such huge amounts of time, money, water, fertiliser and fuel on growing a useless smooth expanse of grass?
sentences.chinese: 为什么美国人要把如此大量的时间、金钱、水、化肥和燃料花在一大片平整却毫无用处的草地上呢？

sentences.english: At the moment we are losing our groundwater very quickly, destroying soil nutrients, and farmers are going into debt because they are dependent on fertiliser and other inputs.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我们正在非常迅速地失去我们的地下水、破坏土壤养分，而农民们正在欠债，因为他们依赖于化肥和其它投入。

name: vision
trans: n. 视力，视觉；视野；想象，展望，幻想

sentences.english: She suffered temporary loss of vision after being struck on the head.
sentences.chinese: 她头部受撞击以后出现暂时性失明。

sentences.english: Tears blurred her vision (= made it difficult for her to see ).
sentences.chinese: 泪水模糊了她的视线。

sentences.english: The idea came to her in a vision.
sentences.chinese: 她在神示中想到了这个主意。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to see

name: pump
trans: n.vt. 泵；打气筒抽吸；抽运；泵送

sentences.english: water/air/beer etc pump (=for moving water, air etc)
sentences.chinese: 抽水机/抽气机/啤酒泵等

sentences.english: It's not enough to get rid of raw sewage by pumping it out to sea.
sentences.chinese: 仅用水泵将未经处理的污水排入海中是不够的。

sentences.english: The money raised will be used to dig bore holes to pump water into the dried-up lake.
sentences.chinese: 筹到的钱款将用来挖井眼，再将水抽入干涸的湖中。

detailed_translations.english: a machine for forcing liquid or gas into or out of something
to make liquid or gas move in a particular direction, using a pump

name: durablesteel
trans: adj. 耐用的，耐久的；持久的钢

sentences.english: a steel bridge
sentences.chinese: 钢铁大桥

sentences.english: stainless steel(= steel that does not change colour ) knives
sentences.chinese: 不锈钢小刀

detailed_translations.english: strong metal that can be shaped easily, consisting of iron and  carbon

name: rebuild
trans: vt./vi. 重建，重新组装(过去分词为rebuilt)

sentences.english: The church was completely rebuilt in the last century.
sentences.chinese: 这座教堂在上个世纪全面重建。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重建；改造，重新组装；复原
detailed_translations.english: to build something again, after it has been damaged or destroyed

sentences.english: My daughter painted a scarlet bear on the windscreen of our car.
sentences.chinese: 我女儿在我们的挡风玻璃上画了一只鲜红的小熊。

sentences.english: As she was thrown forward, the cake went right through the windscreen and landed on the road.
sentences.chinese: 当她由于惯性向前一冲的时候，蛋糕被甩出了挡风玻璃，落到马路上。

sentences.english: A single piece of glass stretches from the hood to the rear, acting as hood, windscreen, roof, and rear window.
sentences.chinese: 一整块玻璃覆盖从引擎盖到车的后部，可以充当引擎盖，挡风玻璃，天窗和后窗。

detailed_translations.english: the large window at the front of a car, bus etc

name: speed
trans: n. (运动、运行的) 速率，速度

sentences.english: I got caught speeding on the A40 yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我在 A40 号干线公路上超速行驶被逮到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 飞驰，迅速前进，急行；加速；超速行驶
detailed_translations.english: to be driving faster than the legal limit
the rate at which something moves or travels

detailed_translations.chinese: 快速传送； 促进， 使加速
detailed_translations.english: to take someone or something somewhere very quickly

sentences.english: a butterfly with beautiful markings on its wings
sentences.chinese: 翅膀上有美丽花纹的蝴蝶

sentences.english: The pheasant flapped its wings vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 野鸡猛烈地拍打翅膀。

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts of a bird’s or insect’s body that it uses for flying
to fly somewhere

sentences.english: carbon atoms
sentences.chinese: 碳原子

detailed_translations.english: the smallest part of an  element  that can exist alone or can combine with other substances to form a  molecule

name: utility
trans: n. 效用，实用；公共事业，公共事业公司(需用复数)

sentences.english: Does your rent include utilities?
sentences.chinese: 你的房租包括公用事业费吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 公用事业〔如煤气、电力等〕
detailed_translations.english: a service such as gas or electricity provided for people to use

name: circulation
trans: n. 流通，循环；血液循环；(报纸、杂志的) 发行量

sentences.english: Exercise improves the circulation.
sentences.chinese: 运动能促进血液循环。

sentences.english: The Treasury Department plans to remove older coins from circulation and replace them with new ones.
sentences.chinese: 财政部打算收回市面上流通的旧版硬币，以新版取代。

detailed_translations.chinese: 血液循环；（资料、货币等）流通
detailed_translations.english: the movement of blood around your body

name: testing
trans: 检测,测试(动词test的动名词)

sentences.english: ...silk and satin in every shade of the rainbow.
sentences.chinese: …如彩虹般五颜六色的丝绸与锦缎。

detailed_translations.chinese: 彩虹；五彩缤纷的排列；幻想
detailed_translations.english: a large curve of different colours that can appear in the sky when there is both sun and rain

detailed_translations.chinese: 使呈彩虹状；如彩虹般装饰

name: vegetation
trans: n. 植被；植物(总称) ；草木

sentences.english: Lefkas has an abundance of lush green vegetation.
sentences.chinese: 莱夫卡斯有葱郁茂盛的植被。

detailed_translations.chinese: 植被；植物，草木；呆板单调的生活
detailed_translations.english: plants in general

name: strong
trans: adj. 强的；坚强的；强壮的；(金属等材料) 强韧的

sentences.english: He was a big strong man.
sentences.chinese: 他高大健壮。

sentences.english: Jack was tall and strong.
sentences.chinese: 杰克又高又壮。

sentences.english: I’m not strong enough to fight him.
sentences.chinese: 和他打我还不够强壮。

detailed_translations.chinese: 坚强的；强壮的；牢固的；擅长的
detailed_translations.english: having a lot of physical power so that you can lift heavy things, do hard physical work etc

name: steam
trans: n. 蒸汽，水蒸气；水汽；蒸汽压力

sentences.english: Steam rose from the hot tub.
sentences.chinese: 水蒸气从热腾腾的浴缸里升起。

detailed_translations.english: the hot mist that water produces when it is boiled
if something steams, steam rises from it, especially because it is hot
if something steams, steam rises from it, especially because it is hot

sentences.english: The coastline can now be monitored by radar.
sentences.chinese: 现在能用雷达监测海岸线了。

sentences.english: We could see the plane quite clearly on the radar screen.
sentences.chinese: 我们在雷达屏幕上可清晰地看到飞机。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that uses radio waves to find the position of things and watch their movement

name: touch
trans: vt.n.vi. 触摸；使某物与……轻轻接触触摸，碰；触觉联系；接触

sentences.english: She reached out to touch his arm.
sentences.chinese: 她伸手去碰他的胳膊。

sentences.english: If your house has been burgled, you shouldn’t touch anything until the police arrive.
sentences.chinese: 如果家中被盗，在警察赶到之前不要动任何物品。

sentences.english: ‘Don’t touch me!’ she yelled.
sentences.chinese: “别碰我！”她大叫道。

sentences.english: Her plight has touched the hearts of people around the world.
sentences.chinese: 她的困境触动了全世界人的心弦。

sentences.english: She felt a gentle touch on her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 她感到有人轻轻碰了一下她的肩膀。

detailed_translations.english: to put your hand, finger etc on someone or something
the action of putting your hand, finger, or another part of your body on something or someone

name: roll
trans: vi. 滚动，打滚；(船只、身体等的) 摇晃，摇摆

sentences.english: The ball rolled into the street.
sentences.chinese: 球滚到了街上。

sentences.english: There was silence as the cameras started to roll.
sentences.chinese: 摄影机开始转动，大家安静了下来。

detailed_translations.english: if something rolls, especially something round, or if you roll it, it moves along a surface by turning over and over

sentences.english: Check your rope frequently, as friction against the rock can wear it away.
sentences.chinese: 要经常检查绳索，因为与岩石摩擦会使它磨损。

detailed_translations.english: when one surface rubs against another

name: flight speed
trans: (鸟类) 飞行的速度 ( 吞 )

name: element
trans: n. (化学) 元素；成分，要素

sentences.english: Business and management elements are built into the course.
sentences.chinese: 本课程加入了商务和管理方面的内容。

sentences.english: Hydrogen is a one-valence element.
sentences.chinese: 氢是一价的元素。

detailed_translations.english: one part or feature of a whole system, plan, piece of work etc, especially one that is basic or important

name: fully grown
trans: 形容词短语 (幼鸟) 成年的，成长为成年(鸟) 的

name: leave (the) nest
trans: 动词短语 (幼鸟) 离开鸟窝

name: breed
trans: vt.n. (动物) 产(子) ，孵(卵) ；使繁殖，饲养(动植物的) 品种

sentences.english: Spaniels are my favourite breed of dog.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙猎犬是我最喜欢的犬种。

sentences.english: Eagles breed during the cooler months of the year.
sentences.chinese: 鹰在一年中较凉爽的季节交配繁殖。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal that is kept as a pet or on a farm
if animals breed, they  mate in order to have babies

sentences.english: Dormice hibernate from October to May.
sentences.chinese: 睡鼠从10月到5月冬眠。

detailed_translations.chinese: 过冬；（动物）冬眠；（人等）避寒
detailed_translations.english: if an animal hibernates, it sleeps for the whole winter

name: attach identification rings
trans: 动词短语 (在幼鸟腿上) 附上身份标识环

name: calm
trans: adj. (海面) 无风浪的，平静的；镇静的，沉着的；安静的

sentences.english: Glen was calm and composed at the funeral.
sentences.chinese: 格伦在葬礼上表现得平静而镇定。

detailed_translations.english: relaxed and quiet, not angry, nervous, or upset
to become quiet and relaxed after you have been angry, excited, nervous, or upset, or to make someone become quiet and relaxed
a situation or time that is quiet and peaceful

name: renewable
trans: adj. (能源等) 可再生的；可更新的；可恢复的

sentences.english: It’s a six-month lease but it’s renewable.
sentences.chinese: 租期六个月，但是可以续签。

sentences.english: a renewable visa
sentences.chinese: 可延期的签证

detailed_translations.english: if an agreement or official document is renewable, you can make it continue for a further period of time after it ends

sentences.english: tree roots
sentences.chinese: 树根

sentences.english: These plants produce a number of thin roots.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物会长出一些细根。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a plant or tree that grows under the ground and gets water from the soil
to grow roots

name: 3 pairs
trans: (新西兰珍稀鸟类白玄鸥的数量只剩下) 三对

sentences.english: heavy seasonal rains
sentences.chinese: 季节性的大雨

detailed_translations.chinese: 季节的；周期性的；依照季节的
detailed_translations.english: happening, expected, or needed during a particular season

sentences.english: The human brain needs to be without oxygen for only four minutes before permanent damage occurs.
sentences.chinese: 人脑缺氧只需4分钟就会造成永久性损伤。

detailed_translations.english: a gas that has no colour or smell, is present in air, and is necessary for most animals and plants to live. It is a chemical element: symbol O

sentences.english: ...a country where drought and famines have killed up to two million people during the last eighteen years.
sentences.chinese: …过去18年来干旱和饥荒致死达两百万人的一个国家。

detailed_translations.english: a long period of dry weather when there is not enough water for plants and animals to live

name: decline
trans: vi./n. 下降；减少；衰退；衰落

sentences.english: Offered the position of chairman, Smith declined, preferring to keep his current job.
sentences.chinese: 对担任主席的邀约，史密斯拒绝了，他宁愿留在现在的职位上。

sentences.english: Mary declined a hot drink and went to her room.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽谢绝了热饮料，到自己的房间去了。

sentences.english: The minister declined to comment (= refused to speak to people who report the news ) about the progress of the peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 部长拒绝就和谈进程发表评论。

detailed_translations.english: to say no politely when someone invites you somewhere, offers you something, or wants you to do something

name: fall
trans: vi. 下降，减少；落下，跌倒；降落(过去式和过去分词分别为fell和fallen)

sentences.english: The tree was about to fall.
sentences.chinese: 那棵树快要倒下了。

sentences.english: The book fell from his hands.
sentences.chinese: 书从他手上跌落。

sentences.english: Enough rain had fallen to flood the grounds.
sentences.chinese: 雨量很大，淹没了地面。

sentences.english: She flushed and her eyes fell (= she looked down ) .
sentences.chinese: 她脸一红，垂下了眼帘。

detailed_translations.english: to move or drop down from a higher position to a lower position

sentences.english: A trunk distinguishes the elephant.
sentences.chinese: 长鼻是象的特征。

sentences.english: So the part of the elephant I experience applies what we know about people and how we apply that to UX design.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我体验的那部分的大象就是我们对人的了解和我们将我们的了解应用于用户体验设计。

sentences.english: Tom: No.Although 75% of its raw materials is elephant dung, it is light delicate fragrance instead of stink. This is due to its special fabrication technology.
sentences.chinese: 不，尽管这种纸里75％的原料都是大象的粪便，但它不但不臭，反而有一种淡淡的清香，这是源于它的特殊的制造工艺。

detailed_translations.english: a very large grey animal with four legs, two tusks(= long curved teeth ) and a trunk(= long nose ) that it can use to pick things up

name: rise
trans: vi. 上升，升起；上涨，升高(过去式和过去分词分别为rose和risen)

sentences.english: The police seem unable to cope with the rising tide of (= large increase in ) car crime.
sentences.chinese: 面对日益增多的汽车罪案，警方似乎无能为力。

detailed_translations.english: to increase in number, amount, or value
an increase in number, amount, or value

sentences.english: To sweeten your oral cavity,you can have a piece of chewing gum.
sentences.chinese: 吃口香糖可以清洁口腔、去除异味。

detailed_translations.english: a type of sweet that you chew for a long time but do not swallow

detailed_translations.chinese: 无花果；无花果树；少许，一些；无价值的东西；服装
detailed_translations.english: a soft sweet fruit with a lot of small seeds, often eaten dried, or the tree on which this fruit grows

name: hunting
trans: n. 打猎，狩猎；(动物的) 猎食；搜寻，寻找

sentences.english: ...the forest ecosystem.
sentences.chinese: …森林生态系统。

detailed_translations.english: all the animals and plants in a particular area, and the way in which they are related to each other and to their environment

name: loss of trees
trans: 失去了树；树没了 ( 连 )

name: appearance
trans: n. 外貌，外观，外表；露面，出现

sentences.english: He was always criticising his wife’s appearance.
sentences.chinese: 他老是批评妻子的外表。

sentences.english: We are often attracted to somebody first by their physical appearance .
sentences.chinese: 我们经常先被一个人的外貌吸引。

sentences.english: Women, in general, tend to be more concerned than men about their personal appearance .
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，女性比男性更注重自己的仪容。

sentences.english: She had an outward appearance of calm, but deep down she was really worried.
sentences.chinese: 她表面上很镇静，内心却十分担忧。

sentences.english: The metal posts spoiled the appearance of the garden.
sentences.chinese: 金属柱子破坏了花园的外观。

sentences.english: A garnish helps to enhance the appearance of any dish.
sentences.chinese: 装饰菜能为任何菜肴增色。

sentences.english: She’s the kind of woman who takes pride in her appearance .
sentences.chinese: 她是那种对自己的外貌感到自豪的女人。

sentences.english: You shouldn’t judge by appearances .
sentences.chinese: 你不该以貌取人。

sentences.english: They work hard at school without giving the appearance of being particularly hard-working.
sentences.chinese: 他们在学校里学习很用功，只是表面上并不显得特别如此。

sentences.english: The case had all the appearances of a straightforward murder.
sentences.chinese: 从所有迹象来看，这个案件都像一宗简单的谋杀。

sentences.english: The pupils looked angelic – but appearances can be deceptive .
sentences.chinese: 这些学生看上去如天使一般，但外表可能是会骗人的。

sentences.english: He was, to all appearances , a respectable, successful businessman.
sentences.chinese: 从各方面看，他都是个体面而成功的商人。

sentences.english: The industry has changed greatly with the appearance of new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 新技术问世后，这一行业出现了天翻地覆的变化。

detailed_translations.english: the way someone or something looks to other people

name: decline again
trans: 动词短语 再一次下降，再一次减少

name: pest
trans: n. 有害的动物，害虫；有害的植物

sentences.english: a chemical used in pest control
sentences.chinese: 用于防治虫害的一种化学品

detailed_translations.chinese: 害虫；有害之物；讨厌的人
detailed_translations.english: a small animal or insect that destroys crops or food supplies

sentences.english: Damp had stained the walls.
sentences.chinese: 墙上留下了潮湿的痕迹。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使潮湿；使阻尼；使沮丧，抑制
detailed_translations.english: to dampen something
water in walls or in the air that causes things to be slightly wet
slightly wet, often in an unpleasant way

sentences.english: All the furniture was covered in dust .
sentences.chinese: 所有的家具都蒙上了灰尘。

sentences.english: a thick layer of dust
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的一层灰尘

sentences.english: There’s not a speck of dust in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 厨房里一尘不染。

sentences.english: Dust particles floated in the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 阳光里飘浮着尘埃颗粒。

sentences.english: A sudden breeze sent motes of dust (= small bits of dust ) dancing in the air.

sentences.english: The earthworm is a useful animal. On the ground it is food for other animals. Under the ground, it makes rich soil for fields and gardens.

sentences.chinese: 但是，当甲虫背脊骨包容的遗传特性显示出一些意想不到的结果时，这些研究人员决定仔细查明蚯蚓的DNA。

sentences.chinese: 乙二醇目前广泛应用于各种产品中，包括聚酯纤维和汽车防冻剂。

sentences.english: Sam’s about the same height as his sister now.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆现在身高和他姐姐差不多了。

sentences.english: State your age, height, and weight.
sentences.chinese: 说出你的年龄、身高和体重。

sentences.english: Rachel had always been scared of heights.
sentences.chinese: 雷切尔过去一直恐高。

detailed_translations.english: how tall someone or something is

sentences.english: There were crumbs and grains of sugar on the table.
sentences.chinese: 桌子上有面包屑和糖粒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谷物， 谷粒， 颗粒； 少量， 微量
detailed_translations.english: a single very small piece of a substance such as sand or salt

sentences.english: He advocated the removal of trade barriers.
sentences.chinese: 他提倡消除贸易壁垒。

sentences.english: Crowds burst through the barriers and ran onto the pitch.
sentences.chinese: 人群冲破围栏跑进球场。

sentences.english: The mountains form a natural barrier between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 群山构成了两国之间的天然屏障。

detailed_translations.english: a rule, problem etc that prevents people from doing something, or limits what they can do

sentences.english: The tadpole has become a frog.
sentences.chinese: 这个蝌蚪已长成青蛙。

sentences.english: A tadpole metamorphoses into a frog.
sentences.chinese: 蝌蚪会变成青蛙。

sentences.english: The frog darted out its tongue to catch a mosquito.
sentences.chinese: 这只青蛙突然伸出舌头捕捉蚊子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 青蛙；[铁路] 辙叉；饰扣
detailed_translations.english: a small green animal that lives near water and has long legs for jumping

sentences.english: He took his cap from under his arm with a flourish and pulled it low over his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他挥手从腋下取出帽子，拉低帽檐盖住眼睛。

sentences.english: He flourished the glass to emphasize the point.
sentences.chinese: 他挥舞着杯子来强调这一点。

detailed_translations.chinese: 兴旺；茂盛；挥舞；炫耀；华饰
detailed_translations.english: a curved line that you use to decorate writing
If you flourish an object, you wave it about in a way that makes people notice it

sentences.english: I pine for the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 我渴望乡下的生活。

detailed_translations.english: If you pine for something, you want it very much, especially when it is unlikely that you will be able to have it
a tall tree with long hard sharp leaves that do not fall off in winter

sentences.english: Farmers say they need less rainwater if they use fertilizer trees.
sentences.chinese: 农民们说，如果它们使用肥料树，就只需要很少的雨水。

sentences.english: Water pollution into streams will be reduced because large volumes of rainwater will be harvested for reuse instead of entering the water pollution cycle.
sentences.chinese: 社区将通过这一创新的项目获益，减少污水进入小河，大量的雨水被收集重新使用,不使水循环污染 .

detailed_translations.english: water that has fallen as rain

sentences.english: an insect bite
sentences.chinese: 昆虫的叮咬

sentences.english: flying insects
sentences.chinese: 飞虫

sentences.english: Don’t forget to bring insect repellant (= a chemical to keep insects away ).
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记带上驱虫剂。

detailed_translations.english: a small creature such as a fly or ant, that has six legs, and sometimes wings

sentences.english: Bird evolved from reptiles, so the first bird must have come out of an egg--laid by a reptile.
sentences.chinese: 禽类是由爬虫类进化而来，所以，第一只禽鸟肯定是从爬虫类孵化的蛋里出来的。

sentences.english: No matter how dry your skin gets, you will never turn into an alligator or any other type of reptile.
sentences.chinese: 不论皮肤多么干燥，你永远不会变成美洲鳄或任何其他一种皮肤粗糙的爬行动物。

sentences.english: This small reptile, which measures just 10 centimeters long, can swim through the sand dunes at up to 15 centimeters per second.
sentences.chinese: 这种身长只有10厘米小型爬行动物，可以在沙子中以最快每秒15厘米的速度游动。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal, such as a snake or  lizard  , whose body temperature changes according to the temperature around it, and that usually lays eggs to have babies

sentences.english: ...a shoal of tuna.
sentences.chinese: …一群金枪鱼。

detailed_translations.english: a large sea fish caught for food

sentences.english: As a fossil hunter, Shubin distinguished himself by leading an expedition to the Arctic in 2004 which uncovered the remains of a fish with a wrist, a creature with part fin, part limb.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名化石搜寻者，舒宾的杰出成就是在2004年带领了一次北极探险。 在这次探险中，他们发现了一种半鳍半肢的动物——一条有腕的鱼化石。

detailed_translations.english: one of the thin body parts that a fish uses to swim

sentences.english: They daubed mud all over themselves.
sentences.chinese: 他们用泥涂满全身。

sentences.english: I dirty my trousers when I step on the mud.
sentences.chinese: 我一脚擩在烂泥里， 把裤子弄脏了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 泥；诽谤的话；无价值的东西
detailed_translations.english: wet earth that has become soft and sticky

sentences.english: Children must not talk to strangers.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子千万不要同陌生人说话。

sentences.english: Sorry, I don't know where the bank is. I'm a stranger here myself.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我不知道银行在哪儿。我不是本地人。

detailed_translations.english: someone that you do not know

name: navigate
trans: vt./vi. 驾驶(船舶或飞机等) ，导航

sentences.english: The river is too dangerous to navigate.
sentences.chinese: 这河道太危险，不适宜航行。

detailed_translations.english: to sail along a river or other area of water

sentences.english: Belladonna and red arsenic are deadly poisons .
sentences.chinese: 颠茄和雄黄都是致命的毒物。

sentences.english: a box of rat poison
sentences.chinese: 一盒鼠药

sentences.english: He killed several people by poisoning their tea.
sentences.chinese: 他在茶里下毒杀死了几个人。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that can cause death or serious illness if you eat it, drink it etc
to give someone poison, especially by adding it to their food or drink, in order to harm or kill them

sentences.english: I walked across the grass.
sentences.chinese: 我走在草地上。

sentences.english: Keep off the grass.
sentences.chinese: 请勿践踏草地。

detailed_translations.english: an area of grass, especially an area where the grass is kept cut short

sentences.english: Sprinkle the dish with chopped fresh herbs.
sentences.chinese: 在菜肴上撒些切碎的新鲜香草。

detailed_translations.english: a small plant that is used to improve the taste of food, or to make medicine

sentences.english: a flowering bush with large shiny leaves
sentences.chinese: 叶子大而油亮的开花灌木

detailed_translations.chinese: 叶子；（书籍等的）一张；扇页
detailed_translations.english: one of the flat green parts of a plant that are joined to its stem or branches

sentences.english: No thanks to the koala.
sentences.chinese: 真要感谢那只树熊？！

sentences.english: Dropbears - Dropbears are an evil species of koala that fall from trees and attack humans.
sentences.chinese: 无尾熊--无尾熊是属于一种树袋熊类的邪恶物种，它专门跳下树攻击人类。

detailed_translations.english: an Australian animal like a small grey bear with no tail that climbs trees and eats leaves

name: request
trans: n.vt. 要求；需要请求；请求得到；索取

sentences.english: They have made an urgent request for international aid.
sentences.chinese: 他们紧急请求国际援助。

sentences.english: To request more information, please call our toll free number.
sentences.chinese: 欲知详情，请拨打我们的免费电话。

detailed_translations.english: a polite or formal demand for something
to ask for something in a polite or formal way

sentences.english: Nearly 10% of the Earth’s surface is covered by ice.
sentences.chinese: 地球表面将近 10% 被冰层覆盖。

sentences.english: Gas bubbles in any liquid tend to rise to the surface .
sentences.chinese: 在任何液体中气泡往往都会浮到表面。

detailed_translations.english: the top layer of an area of water or land
relating to the part of the army, navy etc that travels by land or on the sea, rather than by air or under the sea
if someone or something surfaces, they suddenly appear somewhere, especially after being gone or hidden for a long time

name: shady
trans: adj. 背阴的，阴凉的；隐蔽的

sentences.english: a shady street
sentences.chinese: 背阴的街道

sentences.english: It was nice and shady under the trees.
sentences.chinese: 树下好阴凉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 成荫的；阴暗的；名声不好的
detailed_translations.english: protected from the sun or producing shade

sentences.english: The X-ray showed that the bone was broken in two places.
sentences.chinese: X光检查显示有两处骨折。

sentences.english: Amelia had inherited her mother’s good bone structure.
sentences.chinese: 阿梅莉亚遗传了母亲的优美骨架。

detailed_translations.english: one of the hard parts that together form the frame of a human, animal, or fish body

sentences.english: The heavy rains and flooding killed scores of livestock.
sentences.chinese: 大雨和洪水淹死了许多家畜。

detailed_translations.english: animals such as cows and sheep that are kept on a farm

sentences.english: a yellow rose with a lovely scent
sentences.chinese: 香气怡人的黄玫瑰

detailed_translations.english: a pleasant smell that something has

name: gravity
trans: n. 重力，引力；地心引力

sentences.english: the force of gravity
sentences.chinese: 重力

sentences.english: I could not hide from her the gravity of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 我不能向她隐瞒情况的严重性。

detailed_translations.english: the force that causes something to fall to the ground or to be attracted to another  planet

sentences.english: The average weight of a baby at birth is just over seven pounds.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿的平均出生体重是七磅多一点。

sentences.english: It can be sewn into curtain hems to weight the curtain and so allow it to hang better.
sentences.chinese: 可以把它缝在窗帘的摺边里以增加窗帘的重量，使之更有下垂感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重量，重力；负担；砝码；重要性
detailed_translations.english: how heavy something is when you measure it
If you weight something, you make it heavier by adding something to it, for example, in order to stop it from moving easily

sentences.english: With no natural predators on the island, the herd increased rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 由于岛上没有天然食肉动物，牧群的数量迅速增加。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that kills and eats other animals

sentences.english: " Cornett's attorney, Jack Johnston, said the tooth "looks like it would be from a herbivorous rodent of some type.
sentences.chinese: 科内特的律师杰克·约翰斯顿说，这颗牙“看起来像是某种食草的啮齿类动物的牙。”

sentences.english: 'Chewing is a property which no large herbivorous terrestrial mammal has got rid of, ' said Professor Martin Sander, from Bonn University.
sentences.chinese: “现在，没有大型陆生食草哺乳动物是不需要咀嚼的，”波恩大学的马丁·桑德教授说。

sentences.english: The camel is a herbivorous animal.
sentences.chinese: 骆驼是一种食草动物。

detailed_translations.english: Herbivorous animals only eat plants

sentences.english: The wounded lion bellowed out.
sentences.chinese: 受伤的狮子发出了怒吼。

sentences.english: The lion bounded on the prey.
sentences.chinese: 那头狮子向猎物猛扑过去。

sentences.english: The savages darted spears at the lion.
sentences.chinese: 野蛮人们把矛掷向狮子。

detailed_translations.english: a large animal of the cat family that lives in Africa and parts of southern Asia. Lions have gold-coloured fur and the male has a mane(= long hair around its neck ).

name: net
trans: n. 捕鱼用的网；网状物；网络

sentences.english: We netted three fish in under an hour.
sentences.chinese: 不到一小时我们就网住了三条鱼。

detailed_translations.english: to catch sth, especially fish, in a net

sentences.english: This might need some salt and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 这里面也许要加点盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.english: a pinch of salt
sentences.chinese: 一撮盐

sentences.english: Could you pass the salt?
sentences.chinese: 递一下盐好吗？

detailed_translations.english: a natural white mineral that is added to food to make it taste better or to preserve it

detailed_translations.chinese: 咸水的；含盐的，咸味的；盐腌的；猥亵的
detailed_translations.english: preserved with salt

detailed_translations.chinese: 用盐腌；给…加盐；将盐撒在道路上使冰或雪融化
detailed_translations.english: to add salt to food to make it taste better

sentences.english: Some Italians eat donkeys; South Africans eat ostrich.
sentences.chinese: 有些意大利人吃驴；南非人吃鸵鸟。

sentences.english: He could not say what a parrot or even the unmistakable ostrich was.
sentences.chinese: 他说不清楚鹦鹉是什么或者连不会认错的鸵鸟也不知道。

sentences.english: Although reporters know that the ostrich policy is aimed at appeasing the authorities, they still don’t like it.
sentences.chinese: 尽管记者们清楚知道鸵鸟政策是为了迎合当局者，他们还是不喜欢这样。

detailed_translations.english: a large African bird with long legs, that runs very quickly but cannot fly

name: seal
trans: n.vt. 海豹；印章，图章封住(信封) ；封住(容器、开口) ，把……密封(进容器)

sentences.english: The document carried the seal of the governor’s office.
sentences.chinese: 文件上盖有州长办公室的章。

sentences.english: He broke the wax seal and unrolled the paper.
sentences.chinese: 他揭去封蜡，把纸卷展开。

sentences.english: The window was sealed shut.
sentences.chinese: 这扇窗户被封了起来。

detailed_translations.english: a mark that has a special design and shows the legal or official authority of a person or organization
to close an entrance or a container with something that stops air, water etc from coming in or out of it

name: prey
trans: n. 被捕食的动物，猎物

sentences.english: a tiger stalking its prey
sentences.chinese: 潜行跟踪猎物的老虎

sentences.english: Cats prey on birds and mice.
sentences.chinese: 猫捕食鸟和老鼠。

detailed_translations.english: an animal, bird etc that is hunted and eaten by another animal
(of an animal or a bird) to hunt and kill another animal for food

sentences.english: human genes
sentences.chinese: 人类基因

sentences.english: the genes that regulate cell division
sentences.chinese: 控制细胞分裂的基因

detailed_translations.english: a part of a cell in a living thing that controls what it looks like, how it grows, and how it develops. People get their genes from their parents

sentences.english: A wasp stung me on the arm.
sentences.chinese: 黄蜂蜇了我的手臂。

sentences.english: Years of dealing with plasters and wasp stings on the beach mean handbags and subsequently backpacks are stuffed with remedies.
sentences.chinese: 和药膏和沙滩上黄蜂叮咬打了多年交道，结果是我的手提包和背包里塞满了药物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 黄蜂；[昆] 胡蜂；易怒的人
detailed_translations.english: a thin black and yellow flying insect that can sting you

name: fungus
trans: n. 菌类植物；真菌(复数形式为fungi)

sentences.english: The roses have fungus.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰花长了真菌。

sentences.english: So how do you kill a fungus without harming its host?
sentences.chinese: 问题在于，我们如何才能做到不伤害宿主只杀死真菌呢?。

sentences.english: Monokaryons of this fungus will grow readily as saprophytes in plate or liquid culture .
sentences.chinese: 这种真菌的单核体在平板或液体培养时能像腐生菌那样容易生长。

detailed_translations.english: a simple type of plant that has no leaves or flowers and that grows on plants or other surfaces.  mushrooms  and  mould  are both fungi.

name: fungi
trans: n. 菌类植物;真菌(fungus的复数形式)

sentences.english: Without the fungi, this would be just another sandbar.
sentences.chinese: 如果没有真菌，这里将成为另一个沙洲。

sentences.english: But without fungi we would not have gardens, houses or even feet at all.
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果没有真菌，我们就不会有花园、住宅，甚至脚。

sentences.english: Some of those carbon products transfer from the roots to symbiotic fungi and soil microbes, which store the carbon in the soil as humus.
sentences.chinese: 这些含碳化合物有部分从根部被共生真菌和土壤中的微生物摄取，最后变成腐殖质储存在土壤里。

sentences.english: He was smoking a big cigar.
sentences.chinese: 他在抽一只大雪茄。

detailed_translations.english: a thick tube-shaped thing that people smoke, and which is made from tobacco leaves that have been rolled up

name: migration
trans: n. 移居；(候鸟等的) 迁徙

sentences.english: What does this migration not do?
sentences.chinese: 这种迁移不能做什么？

sentences.english: Because of this and other differences in the two versions, we recommend that you test the maps after migration.
sentences.chinese: 由于这两个版本之间的种种差异，我们建议您在完成迁移后对映射进行测试。

detailed_translations.english: when large numbers of people go to live in another area or country, especially in order to find work

sentences.english: Many journalists here choose to pigeon all but the most innocuous of stories.
sentences.chinese: 除了平淡乏味的报道，这儿的新闻记者将一切通过鸽子传递出去。

sentences.english: As the name implies, pigeon is an awkward pose, and it happens to be the most challenging for me.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，鸽子式是一个很棘手的姿势，它对于我来说是最有挑战性的。

sentences.english: Start slow with forward bends and calf stretches, move on to pigeon pose and plow at the end.
sentences.chinese: 开始时缓慢的前倾伸展和小腿伸展，然后摆出鸽子的姿势再是犁头的姿势。

detailed_translations.english: a grey bird with short legs that is common in cities

sentences.english: My foot hurts.
sentences.chinese: 我脚痛。

sentences.english: I had blisters on the soles of my feet .
sentences.chinese: 我的脚底起泡了。

sentences.english: I dropped a glass earlier, so don’t walk around in bare feet .
sentences.chinese: 我刚才打破了一个玻璃杯，所以不要光着脚到处走。

sentences.english: The vet examined the horse’s hind feet .
sentences.chinese: 兽医检查了马的后蹄。

sentences.english: He walked to the foot of the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 他走到楼梯下面。

sentences.english: He’s six feet tall , with blonde hair.
sentences.chinese: 他身高六英尺，一头金发。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body that you stand on and walk on

name: hunt
trans: vt./vi. 猎取，追猎；搜寻，寻找

sentences.english: lion/rhino/stag etc hunt
sentences.chinese: 猎狮/犀牛/雄鹿等

sentences.english: the hunt for the missing child
sentences.chinese: 搜寻失踪儿童

sentences.english: Wolves tend to hunt in packs (= hunt in groups ) .
sentences.chinese: 狼往往成群捕猎。

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when people chase animals in order to kill or catch them
to chase animals and birds in order to kill or catch them

sentences.english: Don’t forget to water the plants.
sentences.chinese: 别忘记给植物浇水。

sentences.english: a huge chemical plant
sentences.chinese: 一座大型化工厂

sentences.english: Residents have helped us plant trees.
sentences.chinese: 居民们帮助我们种了树。

detailed_translations.english: a living thing that has leaves and roots and grows in earth, especially one that is smaller than a tree
to put plants or seeds in the ground to grow

name: goose
trans: n. 鹅;鹅肉(复数形式为geese)

sentences.english: ...roast goose.
sentences.chinese: …烤鹅。

detailed_translations.english: the cooked meat of this bird

sentences.english: On board, we were given the usual talk on safety procedures (= what to do if an accident happens, or to prevent an accident ) .
sentences.chinese: 在飞机上，我们听了例行的飞行安全讲解。

detailed_translations.english: a way of doing something, especially the correct or usual way

sentences.english: Edward can’t be here today, but he sends his apologies .
sentences.chinese: 爱德华今天来不了，他向大家表示歉意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 道歉；谢罪；辩护；勉强的替代物
detailed_translations.english: something that you say or write to show that you are sorry for doing something wrong

sentences.english: Plants use their roots to absorb moisture from the soil.
sentences.chinese: 植物利用根从土壤中吸收水分。

sentences.english: Your skin’s moisture content varies according to weather conditions.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤的水分含量随着天气状况而变化。

detailed_translations.english: small amounts of water that are present in the air, in a substance, or on a surface

sentences.english: I usually sleep on my back.
sentences.chinese: 我一般仰卧着睡觉。

sentences.english: Did you sleep well?
sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.english: He’s lucky because at least he has somewhere to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 他算是幸运的，至少还有个睡觉的地方。

detailed_translations.english: to rest your mind and body, usually at night when you are lying in bed with your eyes closed
the natural state of resting your mind and body, usually at night

name: mild
trans: adj. 暖和的，温暖的；温和的，温柔的

sentences.english: His voice was soft and mild.
sentences.chinese: 他的声音轻柔温和。

sentences.english: a mild herbicide
sentences.chinese: 药力温和的除草剂

detailed_translations.english: a mild person has a gentle character and does not easily get angry

sentences.english: Hi, honey.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，亲爱的。

detailed_translations.english: a sweet sticky substance produced by  bees  , used as food

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…说甜言蜜语；加蜜使甜

sentences.english: The most important member of any hive is the queen bee.
sentences.chinese: 任何一个蜂房中最重要的成员都是蜂王。

sentences.chinese: 人们一定要记住的是，一个蜂巢很快会变成两个，两个变成四个，四个变成八个。

name: shelter
trans: n.vt./vi. 遮蔽；避难所，收容所掩蔽；庇护；保护

name: impact

sentences.english: Such schemes mean little unless they impact people.

the effect or influence that an event, situation etc has on someone or something

sentences.english: Tokyo is extremely humid in mid-summer.
sentences.chinese: 仲夏的东京十分潮湿。

sentences.english: Beware the sharks when you are making up your mind how to invest.
sentences.chinese: 当你决定如何投资时要提防诈骗者。

sentences.english: Poor mite! You must be starving!
sentences.chinese: 可怜的小家伙！你一定是饿坏了！

detailed_translations.chinese: 极小量；小虫；小孩儿；微小的东西

sentences.english: Bricks are made from clay.
sentences.chinese: 砖是用黏土制成的。

detailed_translations.english: a type of heavy sticky earth that can be used for making pots, bricks etc

name: reproduce
trans: vt./vi. 繁殖，生殖；复制，翻拍

sentences.english: Klimt’s artwork is reproduced in this exquisite book.
sentences.chinese: 这本精美的书里翻印了克里木特的艺术作品。

detailed_translations.english: to make a photograph or printed copy of something

sentences.english: Oil thieves sometimes hawk stolen gasoline on the side of highways.
sentences.chinese: 石油大盗们有时在公路边上兜售偷来的石油。

sentences.chinese: 运河的小堵塞或倒塌都会阻塞整个负责的灌溉网络。

sentences.chinese: 喷洒灌溉，喷灌把水喷洒于准备种植作物的土地上。常常使用经过污水厂处理过的废水。

trans: adj. (土地) 肥沃的，富饶的；(动植物) 多产的，繁殖力强的

sentences.chinese: 想象力丰富的产物

detailed_translations.english: (of a person's mind or imagination) that produces a lot of new ideas

name: closed
trans: adj. (门、窗等) 关闭的，闭合的

trans: (用琥珀制作首饰、饰品时的) 银质材料作为背景，银质材料作为衬托

name: conservation
trans: n. (对自然环境的) 保护；保存

sentences.chinese: 野生生物保护

sentences.english: a local conservation group
sentences.chinese: 当地的一个环境保护团体

detailed_translations.english: the protection of natural things such as animals, plants, forests etc, to prevent them from being spoiled or destroyed

sentences.english: watching monkeys in their natural habitat
sentences.chinese: 观察自然生活环境中的猴子

sentences.english: The grassland is an important habitat for many wild flowers.

sentences.chinese: 有灭绝危险的物种

sentences.chinese: 它们遭受猎杀，几近灭绝。

sentences.english: Conservationists are trying to save the whale from extinction.
sentences.chinese: 生态环境保护工作者正努力挽救鲸类以防止其灭绝。

sentences.chinese: …一个小包裹，用薄棉纸包着。

sentences.chinese: 随着年纪的增大，我们会失去一些肌肉组织。

sentences.chinese: 一小时后车手们要为主赛做热身运动。

sentences.english: What is the texture of your experience?
sentences.chinese: 这次经历的实质是什么？

name: stem
trans: n. (植物的) 茎；树干；叶梗

sentences.chinese: writ是writes、writing和written三个词的词干。

trans: (鲸鱼、海豚、大象等群居性动物的) 较小的群体

sentences.english: How much carbon dioxide you save, if any, depends on how far you live from work and how you get there, among other things.

sentences.chinese: 然后我们有气体冷却反应堆,那能使用超临界二氧化碳或者氦。

sentences.chinese: 但是，正如所罗门和他的同事提出的一项发表在《美国国家科学院院刊》的新研究表明，对最丰富的温室气体，二氧化碳，这是不正确的。

sentences.chinese: 我要换上干衣服。

sentences.chinese: 油漆之前一定先要确保表面清洁干燥。

sentences.english: The path is dry as a bone (= very dry ) .

sentences.chinese: 一团水蒸气升到空中。

sentences.chinese: 擦得锃亮的木地板

trans: adj. 木头的；木制的；僵硬的

sentences.chinese: 木制长椅

detailed_translations.english: made of wood

sentences.english: a waterproof jacket
sentences.chinese: 防水上衣

sentences.english: waterproof adhesive
sentences.chinese: 防水黏合剂

sentences.chinese: 水下摄影机

sentences.chinese: …能在水下高速行驶的巨型潜艇。

sentences.chinese: 鱼缸里的水在不停地被过滤。

sentences.chinese: …一种使安全软件失灵的新型计算机蠕虫病毒。

sentences.chinese: 乔舔了舔干燥的嘴唇。

sentences.chinese: 女孩怒视着我，然后吐了一下舌头。

sentences.chinese: 对付杂草的长期斗争

sentences.chinese: 我一直在除花坛里的杂草。

sentences.chinese: 环境污染物

sentences.english: a dumping ground for toxic pollutants

sentences.chinese: 小路下斜通到池塘。

sentences.chinese: 这个池塘在冬天常常结冰。

sentences.chinese: 为生存而挣扎的农民们把森林伐光来作农业用地。

sentences.chinese: 他把罐子装得太满了。

sentences.chinese: 战斗中，有一名英国士兵受了伤。

sentences.english: an enemy soldier
sentences.chinese: 敌兵

sentences.english: The doctors gave him a one in ten chance of survival .
sentences.chinese: 医生说他有十分之一的生存希望。

sentences.chinese: 这种膜拜仪式是古老的拜火教遗留下来的。

sentences.chinese: 她感觉泪水刺痛了眼睛。

sentences.chinese: 他被蜜蜂蜇了。

sentences.chinese: 我是说真的，一旦他们消除了窒息的危险，那就都是我要走的下坡路。

sentences.english: At that time our relations were going upwards, but since then they have been going downwards [downhill].
sentences.chinese: 那时我们的关系是走上坡路, 此后就开始走下坡路了。

sentences.chinese: 石油价格的上涨

sentences.english: the importance of protecting our oil supplies
sentences.chinese: 保护我们石油供应的重要性

sentences.english: an oil refinery
sentences.chinese: 炼油厂

sentences.english: The bicycle chain needs oiling.
sentences.chinese: 自行车链条需要上油了。

detailed_translations.english: the thick dark liquid from under the ground from which petrol is produced

name: empty

sentences.chinese: 空盒子

sentences.english: an empty bottle
sentences.chinese: 空瓶子

sentences.english: an empty space behind the desk
sentences.chinese: 书桌后面的空位

sentences.chinese: 燃油箱快要空了。

sentences.chinese: 衣橱太重，我一个人移不动。

sentences.english: a heavy suitcase

sentences.chinese: 雄性的重量是雌性的七倍。

sentences.chinese: 大雨在很多地区造成水灾。

sentences.chinese: 苹果树上果实累累。

sentences.chinese: 水土流失的问题
